attributes.action: bring pressure to bear upon the London 2012 organising committee to change their new logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London 2012 organising committee has issued a ridiculous new logo for the 2012 Games - described by a Radio 5 Live producer as looking like "a man and woman caught in a clinch, with a football stuck between then". There was a perfectly adequate logo for the bid, which would have done the job beautifully for the Games. BBC viewers have created other alternatives at http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/in_pictures/6719747.stm

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
